name: arrondissement
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
one of the areas into which Paris and some other large French cities are divided. Arrondissement is a French word: Le Corbusier lived in the 16th Arrondissement.
one of the areas into which a French department is divided. Arrondissement is a French word: In France, cantons are sub-divisions of arrondissements, which are themselves sub-divisions of the regional départements.
